price: Hakika wale wamchaomungu zinapowagusa pepesi za Shetani, mara huzindukana na hapo huwa niwenye kuiyona haki
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Hakika wale wamchao Mola wao Mlezi, na wakaweka baina yao na maasi kinga cha kuzuia uchochezi wa Shetani unao wapitia kuwaachisha yaliyo waajibu wao, hukumbuka uadui wa Shetani na vitimbi vyake. Kwa hivyo hao wanaiona Haki, basi ndio wanarejea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittaqaw idhā massahum ṭāifun mina al-shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mub'ṣirūna
